attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no excuse whatsoever for such dangerous behaviour. 
Alcohol and recreational drugs impair everyone's senses
Indulging this behaviour puts at risk the lives of other people and fills up casualty departments which in turn puts stress on the NHS funds

We believe if those who choose to take the risk faced using public transport for the rest of their lives they would think twice because not to drive would inconvenience them

Driving Bans would reduce pollution and traffic if those foolish enough decided to take the risk

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
